Given as a gift and was well received
Great color. Material feels weird

I like this.  Needed something with sleeves but light weight to fit under a jacket for church.  I think it is a little snugger around chest then I like but it does look okay.  I bought a medium and wear a 34/36 D for comparison.
Love the material. Nice and warm.
Light weight material Soft  Nice design  great price. Dressy enough for evening wear or casual wear for daytime

评论概述: Comfortable and Stylish Women's Business Casual Top
评论详情: This top is perfect for a business casual look. It’s comfortable, fits well, and has a stylish design that’s easy to pair with various outfits. Really pleased with it overall—great choice for the office or casual settings.

评论概述: This was a surprisingly fantastic buy!
评论详情: Great blouse. Soft material. Good fit. I can see why the colors I actually wanted were not in stock. I would definitely buy another one. It is well made of cool fabric and gives a comfortable loose fit.
I love it but wish the neckline was tacked down the collar does a weird inside out ting sometimes

This shirt is really nice. It is light and cool, it could be casual or dressy. I have worn it to work a couple times and I have gotten compliments on it. It is super comfortable. I think it is a little bigger than I would like, but other than that I like it! I love the cream color.
Love this shirt! Got 3 different colors. Baggy fit, stretchy material, soft and the fit is flattering.

I am 49 years old, 5'10 and weigh between 160-165. My weight is well distributed and I wear a 36D. This top fit nicely, sleeves were long enough and I like the fabric.  It should be spelled out this review is for the light blue color. I do intend to get another color to see if there are any variances. The color is a beautiful shade of blue and I am very pleased with this purchase. If it helps to know, I generally shop from BR and am a little particular about clothing. Yes it is 100%polyester, but it doesn't feel like it.
Fit well got lots of compliments
Large is a tad small - still kept and wearing. XL was huge & sent back. Fabric is thick/not see through and doesn't wrinkle. Soft too. I bought two, colours are accurate.
This top is comfortable and very versatile. It runs slightly large however it is a flattering fit.  This top is perfect for the upcoming holiday season and definitely a must have!
Well made, nice fabric, and flattering drape.

This blouse is just okay. I'll wear it again, but can't say I love it. I chose this shirt in hopes of wearing it with leggings, but unfortunately it isn't long enough to cover my butt and crotch, which as a bigger girl I feel is important. Huge dealbreaker! I also didn't care for the elastic at the wrists of the sleeves, because after a long day of work those tend to hurt, and I get tired of adjusting them all day. My final complaint is that the inner lining of the V area of the neck tends to pop out sometimes, and it was annoying having to push it back in. I like thr fabric and will wear it occasionally on the weekends, but it won't be the first blouse I reach for at any point.
This is a very flattering top that is great to wear to work or any special event. It fits as expected and the color is as shown in the listing. It is lightweight and not sheer at all.

This top is very soft, comfortable, and figure flattering. It can easily be dressed up or down, being worn with dress pants, skirts, or jeans. The color is perfect for any Fall or winter wardrobe. Highly recommend!

评论概述: Couldn't get this over my head!
评论详情: I'm annoyed about this top. It's a beautiful deep green color and looks like the photo. The fabric is that soft slinky fabric that will never wrinkle. I couldn't really get it past my shoulders and I almost got stuck in it! I tried on a couple of occasions to make it work and it just didn't. I got my regular size, but because it was XL I can't see if a larger size would've fixed my problem. It might be better to size up, but having only my experience to judge I'm not sure if everyone should.

评论概述: Super cute casual but work-friendly too!
评论详情: Wore this to a work conference and loved the fit and the style! Fully opaque, couldn't see my bra underneath and fit nicely and able to tuck in. Ordered a small and it was still plenty loose on me without looking too tight in the chest. 140 lbs 5'6" 36C.

This is the perfect top to dress up or down in. It is very comfortable, not too dressy, can be worn with jeans or nicer pants. Very comfortable and the neck line is unique.  The beige is nice because it goes with everything.

This shirt is a very pretty emerald shade of green.  It is a little dressier in a nice weight polyester.  It drapes nicely on my plus size body and doesn’t cling, nor is it see through.  For me, I won’t be wearing it with leggings because I like my tops to be a few inches longer than this.
This is a great top. It's chiffon, so definitely a little more dressy. Great addition to any wardrobe.

I liked this long sleeve tunic top. It fit well and as expected. The material was soft and I liked the soft pink color it came in. It did not look all that flattering on me when it just hung loose - as if with a pair of leggings, but it looked great when I tucked it in or french tucked it as shown by the model.

Love the color. Love the style. Love the length. The fabric is not as I expected, but not bad. I just wish the sleeve holes were a bit larger. I don't know why they have to make the arm pit area too small on just about every shirt these days. Fit is expected. I haven't washed it yet, but I don't anticipate any problems. I would recommend to others if you like this style top.

Beautiful, relaxed cut, peasant-style blouse! I got this top in white, and it's more of a winter white color (like with a drop of sunshine in it) rather than a stark or cool white. I wore it to work yesterday with navy blue polka-dot chinos and got tons of compliments.  The fabric is MUCH nicer than I was expecting. It's thick and has a bit of a texture to it, adding interest to an otherwise fairly basic, nondescript blousy top. It also has a fair amount of stretch, which adds to the flattering drape of the fabric. Did not shrink in the wash!  This top is versatile and truly goes with everything!
I really lik this blouse.  It's lightweight but great for a fall day.  Perfect length too.

This top is easy to pop on for work. It looks appropriate and also cute enough to wear after work. I got the light pink and it's more of a peachy pink than dusty rose. The fabric has a slight texture that gives a more interesting look. Size is true but I don't think it's long enough on me to wear over leggings (5'7").
This top is perfect for work or paired with jeans. It feels well-made and drapes nicely. The fit is true to size. I particularly love the v-neck and the banded sleeves.

I love the color, the fit, and the material. The color is just as it is shown in the picture, you can't tell it in my pic, but I think that may be the lighting. This fits true to size. I wear an xl. Very comfortable and I think it is flattering for my body type. Will look nice with a pair of dress slacks or a pair of jeans.

I was pleasantly surprised by the feel of the fabric.  It’s comfortable and feels like quality fabric.  There wasn’t any chemical or unusual smell that can often accompany online clothes orders.  There were a couple of spots with longer threads that needed to be trimmed - like a small oversew.  Not a big deal and easily trimmed.  I ordered the XXL and felt it ran slightly smaller than XXL in other brands.  Overall a good quality and feel - definitely recommend for a versatile blouse.

This blouse is perfect for fall time. It's not super lightweight so you'll freeze, but it also isn't super heavy, so you'll sweat. I do anticipate this being a difficult item of clothing-requiring ironing for each wear. I feel like the fabric wrinkles easily.  The color and fit are great.

First of all, I love the color and design of the shirt itself, however it was way too wide in the shoulders. If I was broader in the shoulders, it would be perfect. I got an XL and that's typically what size I wear in most fabrics. So it is just a bit too big for me. I do have doing have some growing room if that happens. There is no give to the fabric as it is 100% polyester. I particularly prefer fabric with some give. It's not a horrible shirt at all. I should have probably gotten a Large instead. Oh and the sleeves were just a smudge too long, but I am short. For the average height person, the sleeves would be just right. The color didn't fade when I washed it and it didn't shrink, which is a huge plus.

I really like this blouse. The color is stunning. I don’t think the photos do it justice. The arm length is great, the sleeves it exactly at my wrist. The V at the neck is the only slight issueI have. The underlying fabric comes up a bit if I move around. I’m a 38D. So that might have something to do with it. I’m still going to wear it- it’s not that big of deal to me. The overall length is great too! I highly recommend, just be mindful of your sizing if you are well endowed in the chest region!!! Otherwise it fits to your true size!

I absolutely love this blouse!! I'm between a size 10/12, so I got it in a large. It is true to size and fit me perfectly.  I was a little hesitant with the elastic in the wrists as sometimes they can be bothersome and fit tight, but this blouse doesn't do that at all. The material feels good on my skin and it appears to me well made and not cheap looking at all. I can't wait to wear it with a pair of jean or leggings. I may order another one in a different color. I definitely recommend this product.

Wore this to dinner tonight and loved it. Great to dress up or down. I paired it with skinny dark wash blue jeans, black belt and heels with a black clutch with silver hardware and silver jewelry. Perfection! Definitely a closet staple and will be getting added colors.

I expected this shirt to be kind of tight from the back like most shirts are. This is extremely comfortable and is made out of very stretchy material. The pink color looks exactly like on the picture. I'm usually a L/XL depending on the fabric and how stretchy it is, but the large was a perfect fit. It isn't too tight and is still a little loose. Bought this shirt for work, but I might just use it with some leggings throughout the winter for date night!
This top is lightweight but hangs nicely.  The color is a muted rose and looks good with various pants, including jeans, and even works under a blazer.  Great top!

This blouse is the bomb! Easy overhead, soft, stylish, just in time for fall season. It’s also very comfortable. It’s a soft gray color that will match almost anything. It can be styled for dressy or with a pair of jeans for a night out. It will become a staple very quickly! Add a jacket or a sweater for winter and it easily becomes winter wear too! I’ll be wearing this often and might have to get it in white too! I like it!

I am 5'5" 175lbs and ordered this blouse in medium. The fit was good and the fabric comfortable, but I don't think I'll be keeping it. There is a small amount of stretch that goes the wrong direction (up-down rather than side-to-side). Though not see through, it also showed the outline of my bra underneath. I debated keeping it to layer under something else because it IS comfortable, but I'm pretty sure it is one of those items that would just sit in my closet and never be worn. If you have a build that is more slender than curvy, I think the blouse would be very flattering for you.
Vêtement de tous les jours
Basic but love it fits great
This blouse is slightly tight, l have to send it back and order next size up.
Beautiful
bien
Love the fit! True to size. Excellent fabric and nice shape. Great to casually dress up jeans or wear under a blazer professionally.
Actually good quality. Wasn’t expecting anything but I am impressed. Normally I’d be a 4-6 and I bought a small, fit was alright
